item.title: A Brief Introduction to Derivatives
item.author: Jinay Patel,
item.description: If you’ve flicked past all of the puzzles and literally every other section to get to Investments, well then I know you’re probably a banker w*****. All jokes asides, if any of you have read more than 3 articles on FT or spoke to a Business School student for 5 minutes, you’ve probably heard of a …
